summary: Frontend UI/UX redesign verification completed. All features tested successfully: Landing page renders without errors, Order dialog works without 'Maximum update depth exceeded' error, Module selection works correctly, Login page works with test credentials, Navigation links work, Tenant portal login renders at /huurder/login, Mobile responsive design works correctly.
passed_tests: Landing page renders without errors - hero section visible
Landing page - features section visible
Landing page - modules section visible
Landing page - CTA section visible
Landing page - footer visible with proper layout
Order dialog opens without 'Maximum update depth exceeded' error
Order dialog - form fields present (name, email, phone, company, password)
Order dialog - module selection works (Vastgoed Beheer, HRM)
Order dialog - total price updates when module selected
Order dialog - closes correctly with Annuleren button
Login page renders with modernized design
Login page - form elements present (email, password, submit)
Login page - forgot password link present
Login page - register link present
Login page - tenant login link present
Login works with test credentials (shyam@kewalbansing.net / test1234)
Login redirects to /app/dashboard after successful login
Navigation - Home link works
Navigation - Prijzen link works
Navigation - Over Ons link works
Navigation - Voorwaarden link works
Navigation - Privacy link works
Tenant portal login page renders at /huurder/login
Tenant portal - login form present
Tenant portal - link to main login present
Mobile responsive - page renders correctly on mobile viewport (390x844)
Mobile responsive - mobile menu toggle present and works
Mobile responsive - menu items visible when opened
Mobile responsive - hero title visible
Mobile responsive - CTA buttons present

landing_page_redesign.description: Landing page renders with new glassmorphism styling, gradient buttons, Outfit font for headings, Plus Jakarta Sans for body text

order_dialog_bug_fix.description: Order dialog opens and works without 'Maximum update depth exceeded' error. Module selection and total price calculation work correctly.

login_page_redesign.description: Login page has modernized split layout with image on left and form on right. Login works with test credentials.

navigation_links.description: All navigation links work: Home, Prijzen, Over Ons, Voorwaarden, Privacy

tenant_portal.description: Tenant portal login page renders correctly at /huurder/login

mobile_responsive.description: Mobile responsive design works correctly with hamburger menu, stacked CTA buttons, and proper layout

design_verification.glassmorphism: Verified - glass-header class applied to navigation, backdrop-blur effects visible
design_verification.gradient_buttons: Verified - CTA buttons use emerald gradient (from-emerald-500 to-emerald-600)

fonts.headings: Outfit font applied via font-heading class
fonts.body: Plus Jakarta Sans applied via font-body class

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX redesign verified. Order dialog bug (Maximum update depth exceeded) is fixed. All navigation and responsive design working. Test credentials: shyam@kewalbansing.net/test1234 for customer, admin@facturatie.sr/admin123 for superadmin.
